channel.title: NIST on Jan Richter-Brockmann
channel.description: Recent content in NIST on Jan Richter-Brockmann

item.title: BIKE: Bit Flipping Key Encapsulation
item.description: BIKE is a code-based key encapsulation mechanism based on QC-MDPC (Quasi-Cyclic Moderate Density Parity-Check) codes submitted to the NIST Post-Quantum Cryptography Standardization Process.
